title: Effetto Mariposa updates Caffélatex Tubeless Valves, adds wide Shelter frame protection
content:
Effetto Mariposa has tweaked their Caffélatex tubeless valves & Shelter Wide frame protection tape to help give your bike a winter refresh. The valves themselves get updated to better fit on more tubeless setups, with a new stealth look option & integrated valve core remover. And the three levels of stick-on Shelter protection now better […]

The post Effetto Mariposa updates Caffélatex Tubeless Valves, adds wide Shelter frame protection appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
